name: Tech vs Magic
description:
EVOLVING BATTLEFIELD
The magic dimension is tearing into ours, expanding and replacing the world as it goes. Stand against it or help it conquer our realm; destiny is yours to shape, What will you do?

INTENSE VEHICLE COMBAT
Ride into battle on your war mount, or make the earth shake from your tank treads. It’s modern technology against mythical creatures from another realm; ride dragons or fly an Apache Attack helicopter as you support your side in this reality bending conflict.

GRENADES OR GOLEMS
TVM pits modern tech against hardcore magic, you choose if you want the firepower of an AR-15, or the searing heat of a fireball. Play multiple classes on either side, from a summoner calling forth creatures from the fadesphere, to a spec-ops commando kicking ass and taking names. The stakes are set, and it’s anybody’s game.
